modmenu.descriptionTranslation.textfiler: A mod that can read out-of-game files in game
options.textfilereader.removeinvalidfile:
When updating the permissions file, it checks for invalid files and removes the permissions from the file if the option is yes!
§4Doing so causes the file's permissions to be removed!
§4Especially if you are deleting and then copying new files!
options.textfilereader.segmentedoutput.t:
(client only)
(this is usually used for /FileReader Read or /cFileReader Read)
If the option is yes, the contents of the file will be output to the chat window in segments.
This will cause some of the file content to be grabbed by other output text before the rest of the file is output, resulting in intermittent output of the file.The output of the file will not look as good as it should
text.filereader.description: A mod that can read out-of-game files in game
text.filereader.permission.success.give: Read access to %s is successfully given to %s, and the changes will take effect later
text.filereader.permission.success.remov: Read access to %s is successfully remove to %s, and the changes will take effect later
text.filereader.printcurrentpath: There are the following text files under the path:%s
text.filereader.printfile: There are the following text of %s:%s
text.filereader.printfile.wrongrange: Integer must not be less than %d, found %d
